signUpForm.title: Welcome to Consilium!
signUpForm.passwordHint: Please choose a password for your account
signUpForm.passwordConfirmHint: Just to be sure, please confirm your password one more time
signUpForm.description1: You want to create an account?
signUpForm.hint1: You'll be asked to enter your email address and choose a password.
signUpForm.hint2: We'll then send you a verification email to activate your account.
signUpForm.signInHint: If you already have an account, you can sign in instead.
signUpForm.passwordRuleHint: Has to have at least 8 characters
signUpForm.passwordDescription: Please choose a password for your account
signUpForm.passwordRepeatDescription: Just to be sure, please confirm your password one more time
signUpForm.interfaceDescription: You can customize your experience with Consilium by setting the language you want to see the site in, as well as the theme.
signUpForm.successDescription1: We sent you an email with a verfication link.
signUpForm.successDescription2: Use that link to activate your account.
signUpForm.successDescription3: Please also check your spam folder if you can't find it.

passwordWrong: This doesn't seem to be your current password
changePasswordDescription2: No one should know your password (well, except you, of course).
changePasswordHint: After saving, you will be signed out and will have to sign in with your new password.
languageDescription: The language you see this website in.
themeDescription: Whether you want to see the site in light or dark design.
translationHelp: If you want to help translating the site into a different language, feel free to reach out to us via
deleteDescription: This will delete your account and all the persons linked to that account. You won't be able to sign in to the account again after this.
deleteHint: Enter the account's email address to continue
deleteWarning: !!! This cannot be undone - everything will be gone !!!
emailDescription: Your email address. This email is unique to your account. You use it to sign in to this account.
emailChangeDescription: After saving, you will be signed out and will have to sign in with the new email address.
emailMustEqual: Email must be your account's email
emailUnique: There is an existing account with this email address. Looks like you have an account, already.
credentialsWrong: We couldn't find an account with these credentials.
dateFormatDescription: The format you want to see dates in.
timeFormatDescription: The format you want to see time values in.
